message: Many of use write Javascript code "Kinafa" so find this nice javaScript Conventions
story: Mohamed Alaa El Din shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Code Conventions for the JavaScript Programming Language
caption: javascript.crockford.com
description: This is a set of coding conventions and rules for use in JavaScript programming. It is inspired by    the Sun document Code Conventions for the Java Programming Language. It is heavily modified of course because JavaScript is not Java.
